## Plugin() function

Indicates that an decorated class is a "plugin".


**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function Plugin(identifier?: string): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  identifier | string | _(Optional)_ class name |

**Returns:**

ClassDecorator
